title: 任性歌单：Yu Su(苏玉) - 永不疲倦的迷宫、混沌和梦

title_detail.value: 任性歌单：Yu Su(苏玉) - 永不疲倦的迷宫、混沌和梦

itunes_title: 任性歌单：Yu Su(苏玉) - 永不疲倦的迷宫、混沌和梦
subtitle: 新的小栏目，女音乐人歌单推荐

subtitle_detail.value: 新的小栏目，女音乐人歌单推荐

summary:
一个小栏目，请女音乐人来介绍自己喜欢的歌。这期是音乐制作人+DJ苏玉的歌单，主题是“让人愉悦安宁的歌”。


03‘44: Ana Roxanne - I’m Every Sparkly Woman

05‘50: You’re Me - Lucidity

12'30: Spike - you can do it

14'50: Tommy Mandel - I Alpha

22'45: Pablo's Eye - That Night Together With Her

27'50: 33EMYBW - 昨晚他们来田里趴体了

​31'30: CS + Kreme – Eyes On Ceiling

40'45: Susumu Yokota - kinoko

48'20: Kate NV - yxo Ear

52'57: Kaitlyn Aurelia Smith - stratus

55'55: Ondo Fudd - Eyes Glide Through the Oxide

60'55: Anna Domino - Land of dreams

65'15: Mount Kimbie - Marilyn ft. Michachu

69'20: Yuji Toriyama - Maze

72'46: Tanz Mein Herz - Territory

79'20: Kate Bush - Running Up That Hill


欢迎来到《 别任性 》的第42期，来自别的女孩（biedegirls）。

Get bonus content on Patreon

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
